content.rendered:
We have won numerous awards and accolades over the years

Over time, we have received a great deal of recognition and prizes.

Quality has become a habit at RPPL. Over the years, we have received various prizes and commendations as a result of our innovation. However, via quality, productivity, customer satisfaction, and profitability, toward a top-tier organization and a leader in the sector.

Esteemed Customer Award Received from Metso India

ISO 9001: 2015 Certificate

Telangana Best Employer Brand Awards 2018.

Rithwik Projects Pvt Ltd. has been selected as Company of the Year – ECNO in the Zee Business Dare to Dream Awards-2018.

Rithwik Projects received a Certificate of Excellence in recognition of our Exemplary Growth from India Inc. 500 for the year 2011.

Rithwik Projects received the award for excellence in productivity, quality, innovation, and management

Rithwik Projects received the award for excellence in productivity, quality, innovation, and management from Dr. T. Subbarami Reddy, Minister of State for Mines, Govt. of India. The award, instituted by the Institute of Economic Studies (IES), was presented in New Delhi at a Seminar on “Current Economic Scenario” on December 13th, 2007.

CM Ramesh received the Year 2007 Udyog Rattan Award from the Institute of Economic Studies, New Delhi for his outstanding contribution to Indian infrastructure development.

Bharatiya Shiromani Puraskar award for Excellence in Enhancing the Image of India

Dr. BhishmaNarainSingh, Former Governor of Tamil Nadu & Assam, has awarded Rithwik Projects with the Bharatiya Shiromani Puraskar award for Excellence in Enhancing the Image of India. The award was conferred by the “Institute of Economic Studies (IES) in New Delhi at a seminar on February 13th, 2006.

Mr. CM Ramesh received the Bharatiya Shiromani Puraskar Award from the Institute of Economic Studies, New Delhi for his contribution to Indian industrial growth.CSR

Spending time and money on assisting men to do more for themselves is far superior to simply giving.

Awards & Recognitions

RPPL Group comprises has been recognized on a regional and global level, winning a number of major awards. Here are a few of our honors.
Previous
Next

Brands and brand partners

In our experience, we have been build exclusive partnerships with global and internationally superior brands and agencies.

As a trusted and well-established commercial enterprise, RPPL group has proudly partnered with these brands and agencies to introduce them to the India market and beyond. Over the years.
